data.title: Conference breakfast
data.text: Had a conference at the convention center- Taki's is right around the corner. Great breakfast- fast, hot and delicious. The gyro omelet was perfect and a side of Texas toast- yumm!

data.title: Great little greek resturant
data.text: Taki's was  great little restaurant. Located next to the convention center, it was a quick walk for lunch. Service was great, and fast. Food was great, fresh and arrived quickly.

data.title: Great food and service!
data.text: I love going to Taki's for lunch. It is always delicious and pretty well-priced. The service is always great too!

data.title: Great Breakfast
data.text: Had a gyro and feta omlet.  Excellent and excellent customer service.  Quite a few peoole came in and waiter and owner seemed to know everyone by name.  Very good vibe with good food.

data.title: Good food
data.text: Needed breakfast and this was the closest restaurant that still served breakfast at 1130 in the morning. Prices are on par for  typical diners.

data.title: Fantastic Breakfast Restaurant in Downtown Buffalo NY
data.text: Had an early morning meeting and decided to eat breakfast beforehand. Checked online and found Taki's Restaurant was within a few blocks of meeting. They were just opening, 8:00am, as my guest and I walked in the door. Quaint decor, clean and inviting. Waitress said we could sit anywhere, we picked a booth. Ordered veggie omelette with cheese and spinach/mushroom omelette. Best omelettes ever, cooked perfectly and seasoned well. Home fries were delicious too, not greasy or overcooked. Had a choice of wheat or rye toast, picked rye. Coffee refills were plentiful. Waitress was courteous and efficient. Looking forward to dining at this restaurant very soon again.

data.title: Nice Little Diner Type Place
data.text:
Stopped here for lunch one day, while in town at a conference. Lunch options were decent, and I went with a grilled cheese and fries. No complaints there. It was well cooked, and tasty. I do love me a grilled cheese. :) 

the place is small, and filled up fast with all the conference attendees, but they seemed to be able to keep a handle on things and the service was not affected. 

Plenty of Greek choices for those interested. My coworker ordered something Greek, I have forgotten what it was now, but she was quite pleased.

data.title: good breakfast cafe
data.text: We stumbled across this place while visiting Buffalo and in search of a late breakfast. Our Greek omelets were tasty and filling. Check out the quotes on the walls--even the Greek gods recommend Taki's :)

data.title: Average
data.text:
Nothing special service was good.
Basic dinner food very oily.
Nothing to write home about.
The pancakes were good.
Leaving this place you get a nice view of city hall.

data.title: Hmm very good food
data.text: Taki's is a great little diner/restaurant serving pretty much everything for breakfast and lunch. As Taki, the owner, is from Greece he make the best slowaki ever! Staff is friendly and prompt. The place could use a renovation but that would drive up the prices which are very reasonable. Highly recommended :)

data.title: Good value breakfast
data.text:
Dropped in here for breakfast as opposed to hotel breakfast and got much better value
Eggs made to order, home cut home fries and good coffee - worth the walk

data.title: Hit and miss
data.text:
Classic Greek diner open M-F for breakfast and lunch in downtown Buffalo.

French fries, good, turkey club/melts/sandwiches/wraps good. 

Omelettes are good, but the veggie one came with canned mushrooms, which I despise.  

Salads are OK. Their house dressing is mostly oil and lacking in flavor. 

Had tuna salad once that was clearly suspect and I would not order again. Probably my fault for ordering tuna salad at a greasy, spoon. 

Never tried the soups but they're on my list. 

Service leaves a lot to be desired. Some of the regular servers are great, attentive, friendly. Others are drifters and just can't seem to get an order right no matter how hard they try. But this is probably just a diner thing. 

Overall a solid choice if you're looking for a hot meal that's cheap if you're downtown over the lunch or breakfast hour.

data.title: Delicious!
data.text: We were on our way to Niagara falls and stopped in Buffalo and happened to find Taki's restaurant so we went in for lunch.  The food was delicious! I forget what the name of my meal was called, but it was some sort of chicken wrap.. so good!! My husband got the gyro and his was good as well.  Very decent prices.

data.title: Εξαιρετικο εστιατοριο
data.text: Επισκεφθηκαμε το taki's restaurant ενα εξαιρετικο εστιατοριο στο κεντρο του μπαφαλο με  πολυ ωραιες γευσεις σε ολα του τα φαγητα το σερβις ηταν αψογο,γρηγορο κ το ολο το προσωπικο παντα χαμογελαστο και προθυμο να σε βοηθησει.οι χωροι του πεντακαθαροι και εσωτερικα και εξωτερικα το προτεινουμε ανεπιφυλακτα σε οσουν ταξιδεψουν εως εκει η ακομα και αν  τυχαινει να περνανε απο εκει κοντα. μπραβο σας,στην καλη δουλεια που εχετε κανει θα σας ξαναεπισκεφθουμε συντομα
